featured.text: Moreover, each visitor is offered the option to wear a GPS Adventure Band, which allows them to keep track of each other while in the park.

definition.zh_def: 全球定位系統，一種利用衛星信號來確定地球上物體位置的技術。
definition.en_def: Global Positioning System, a technology that uses satellite signals to determine the location of objects on Earth.
definition.example: I used my GPS to find the quickest route to the restaurant.
